page.title: The Decomposer
page.text: Used to deconstruct items and blocks into [guide name=matter_plasma]. Used in conjunction with the [item name=replicator] to provide [guide name=matter_plasma] for replication.

page.title: How to use
page.text: Put an item that can be replicated, int the input slot. After the item is broken down the internal tank will be filled with proportional amount of matter. You can use [item name=matter_pipe] or any other fluid pipe to transfer the matter to other machines.

To see how much matter an item contains, hold Shift while the item tooltip is active. You can view more information about the energy cost and matter drain of the decomposing item, by hovering over the matter or energy tank.
There is a small chance the $itemName can fail the decomposition and produce [item name=matter_dust guide=matter_fail] as a byproduct. This chance can increase if you use Speed upgrades.
By using a [item name=tritanium_wrench] you can pick the machine up with all of it's matter and energy as well as all of it's upgrades and configurations intact.
